original_title: Die Mulattin Else oder Eine deutsche Art zu lieben
overview: Else, a half-breed child from the secretive harem of the German colonial elite, is the daughter of the governor's deputy Jesko von Puttkammer, who disappeared to faraway Germany. Else became an old woman who had suffered all her life from remaining fatherless. The film finally confronts Else's only half-sister from German nobility with the mulatto sister-in-law from Africa.
title: Die Mulattin Else oder Eine deutsche Art zu lieben
